summary: The contact owns a 2021 Freightliner Chassis. The contact stated that the passenger’s side entry door was flexible and that the door would blow and shake while driving at various speeds. The manufacturer had been notified of the failure and the contact was referred to the dealer. The contact notified the dealer where the RV was purchased of the failure however, no assistance was provided. The vehicle was not repaired. The failure mileage was approximately 1,500.
